column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=That comic made fun of Xenocide and did n’t mention the final book Children of the Mind at all .
#Text=Do you have an opinion there ?
#Text=R. I have not read either of those books since high school , and for me that ’s getting further and further away .
#Text=So I have n’t read either of those books in 6 or 8 years .
#Text=My memories of Children of the Mind are that at least had had the end of the story there and so at least playing out , and being “ ok , that happened . ”
#Text=I do n’t remember all the details but that there was something to it .
#Text=All my memories of Xenocide are a girl with obsessive compulsive disorder and Chinese history for many pages .
#Text=So I did n’t have very good feelings to Xenocide .
#Text=But neither of those two did I feel were on the same levels as Ender ’s Game or Speaker for the Dead .
#Text=I just picked Xenocide as the most clear target of them .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Have you seen Orson since this conference started ? ( Orson Scott Card was the featured speaker at Vericon )
#Text=R : I have not .
#Text=I have a t-shirt though that he signed .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Obviously he ’s aware this specific one about Xenocide .
#Text=R : Xenocide followed from that joke I decided to make .
#Text=I wanted her to be reading a book and wanted him ( the character ) to object to it and I worked out how the conversation should go .
#Text=And then I asked ok who should I pick on ?
#Text=I ended up with Xenocide because I just do n’t have great memories of it .
#Text=It could be if I reread it I ’d enjoy it .
#Text=But um .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) But you did say in the alt-text , “ cue nasty emails from all 7 seven fans of Xenocide ” . So it seems you understood that it was one of Orson ’s less popular works at best
#Text=R : I ca n’t resist getting in another crack like that .
#Text=Even if that ’s not true , it 's funny to say so .

#Text=It 's like whenever you say anything about , about “ we ’ve offended the persons in favor of what we do n’t like here ” you can always throw in “ fortunately that ’s not many people that do n’t like that thing ” .
#Text=That ’s almost a standard gag .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Did you actually try the 28 hour day ? ( Comic 320 , 28-Hour Day )
#Text=R : Yeah .
#Text=I tried it a couple times in fact .
#Text=I ’m coming off of a 5 day period of doing that when I was rolling my schedule around .
#Text=So I found that if I do it for more than a week I start to go crazy .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) That ’s exactly what you said in the alt-text actually .
#Text=R. Yeah that was . it gets to be the Sunday mornings where you have to stay up until the afternoon and nothing is happening .
#Text=And no one is awake .
#Text=The campus is dead .
#Text=The apartment is dead .
#Text=The internet is dead .
#Text=And you have to stay awake , and you ’ve already been awake for 14 hours .
#Text=That ’s when I ’d fail at that .
#Text=And then I ’d fall asleep .
#Text=And then you ’re back on the standard college student schedule .
#Text=And that ’s when it always failed for me .
#Text=And I ’d always start to feel really tired in the middle of the day even though from the equations I should n’t .
